    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Russian in customer service</string>
            <string language="fi">Palveluvenäjää</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Russe im Kundendienst</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Russe dans le service à la clientèle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Russian no serviço de cliente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Russo nel servizio di cliente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρωσικά στην εξυπηρέτηση πελατών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ruso en servicio de cliente</string>
          </title>
          <language>fi</language>
          <language>ru</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A connection exercise where phrases used in customer service situations are connected with their natural pairs.</string>
            <string language="fi">Yhdistelytehtävä, jossa yhdistetään palvelutilanteissa käytettäviä fraaseja luonteviin pareihinsa.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fi">Opetushallitus</string>
            <string language="en">palvelutilanteet</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Anschlußübung, in der die Phrasen, die in 
den Kundendienstsituationen verwendet werden, mit ihren natürlichen 
Paaren angeschlossen werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un exercice de connexion où des expressions 
utilisées dans des situations de service à la clientèle sont 
reliées à leurs paires normales.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um exercício da conexão onde as frases usadas em
situações do serviço de cliente sejam conectadas com seus pares 
naturais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'esercitazione del collegamento dove le frasi 
usate nelle situazioni di servizio di cliente sono collegate con i 
loro accoppiamenti naturali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια άσκηση σύνδεσης όπου οι φράσεις που 
χρησιμοποιούνται στις καταστάσεις εξυπηρετήσεων πελατών 
συνδέονται με τα φυσικά ζευγάρια τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un ejercicio de la conexión donde las frases 
usadas en situaciones del servicio de cliente están conectadas con 
sus pares naturales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">palvelutilanteet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">palvelutilanteet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">palvelutilanteet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">palvelutilanteet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">palvelutilanteet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">palvelutilanteet</string>
          </keyword>
